mapper.insert: INSERT INTO todos (title, description, completed) VALUES (#{title}, #{description}, #{completed})
mapper.select: SELECT todos.todo_id AS todo_id, title, description, completed, tags.name as tag_name FROM todos LEFT OUTER JOIN todos_tags ON todos.todo_id = todos_tags.todo_id LEFT OUTER JOIN tags ON todos_tags.tag_name = tags.name WHERE todos.todo_id = #{todoId}
mapper.update: UPDATE todos SET title = #{title}, description = #{description}, completed = ${completed} WHERE todo_id = #{todoId}
